p: All data generated or analysed during this study are available at Figshare: Datasets and R code for estimating the amount of genetic variation in susceptibility https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.6743339; DGRP dataset https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.6743354; DSPR dataset and R code https://doi.org/10.6084/m9.figshare.7195751.
